title: An NBA Mock Draft War Room With Kevin O’Connor, Jonathan Tjarks, and J. Kyle Mann
description:
The Ringer’s Bill Simmons is joined by Kevin O’Connor, Jonathan Tjarks, and J. Kyle Mann to discuss the upcoming NBA draft. They run through the lottery teams, fake trades, sleepers, and more!

Host: Bill Simmons
Guests: Kevin O’Connor, Jonathan Tjarks, and J. Kyle Mann
Producer: Kyle Crichton
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
